gov.fnal.ppd.dd.util

Class SimpleMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.fnal.ppd.dd.util.SimpleMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class SimpleMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    A listener to attach to a Component to help the caller select a JCardLayout card when clicked.
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation
